data.title: Sherri Schmid
data.text:
Testimonials

When we started our year long journey of searching for our forever home in a volatile market, we had no clue of the adversity we would be facing in our lives. Not only was Sherri Schmid patient with us and took us to every house we wanted to see, she walked beside us through our personal challenges. She knew exactly what we were looking for, helped us through every step of the process, then when we found the perfect house to purchase, she jumped in and sold our old house in the blink of an eye. Sherri and Groome & Co are awesome and made things super easy and simple!!!!

I had the best experience with Sherri Schmid! She was very knowledgeable with the market and helped us find exactly what we were looking for! She was always quick to respond and quick to get us in for showings. Any questions we had, she could answer. She was also very patient with our 1.5 year old son. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience! She made buying our first house such a pleasant experience!

My wife and I had such a great experience working with Sherri Schmid while looking for a new home. This was our first home purchase, and Sherri did an amazing job of walking us through the process, answering our questions, and helping us find our house. We definitely recommend!

We recently completed our purchase using Groome & Co Realtors, specifically Sherri Schmid. We needed to find a house in the Arlington area while living overseas. Traveling to view and decide on a house was difficult due to COVID and the travel distance. Sherri was so accommodating and completed our showings using video chats. We have never lived in the Arlington area and depended on Sherri to guide us to an ideal neighborhood and school district. Sherri also connected us to a great title company that helped the signing process be completed easily, even though we are overseas. We couldn’t be happier with our house and the entire process. I would recommend them without hesitation and plan to use them for any additional real estate needs in the future. Thank you Groome & Co Realtors and Sherri! Eric

I'm going to come off completely overdramatic here, but being overly descriptive of how amazing Sherri is, is still an understatement. I kid you not, she will do everything in her power to help you out. She is in it for YOU. She's not here to play both sides, she's willing to work with you and find you a house you love and want to be in. She is so personable and still keeps relationships with you even after you close on your home. We talk about her as our second mom that's how wonderful she is. If there is anyone I can recommend to you, this is who you want. Don't even give her a second thought. Just do it!

Sherri Schmid is absolutely incredible! She made selling stress-free and easy! She

has the best personality and her knowledge to answer all my questions were super

helpful. I had zero worries and all the confidence in Sherri. I trusted her with every

decision made. She is absolutely the BEST REALTOR in all of Tennessee.

Sherri is an exceptional real estate agent from the first steps to the very last day.

She is attentive to the needs of her customer and looks at each property not only for

what it is, but what could be. She was able to help us choose our perfect home and

was available for questions through out the closing process. We adore Sherri!

I recently had the pleasure of working with Sherri when selling my mother’s home

and also my home. From day 1, Sherri was extremely responsive and had great

suggestions for getting the houses ready to list on the market . All throughout the

negotiations and closing Sherri was there quickly handling any issues that may

have risen. If the time ever comes when Someone I know will be selling or looking

for a new home, there isn't any question on who I will recommend!

Sherri was so helpful when we sold one house and bought another. She was always available for any questions or concerns we had. She was quick with any and all responses. If we had any issues she addressed them immediately and had them resolved just as quickly. Sherri made a stressful time of moving very pleasant! I would and have recommended her to friends who are not in need of a knowledgeable realtor. I couldn’t have asked for better service and professionalism. Our home sold the first day on the market! I highly recommend her to anyone! She’s the best!

Sherri has a very sweet and outgoing personality! She is easy to talk to and is more than willing to do whatever it takes to get your property sold. You goes over and above and was always available to answer questions or phone calls. I havd recommended her to everyone I know that is looking to buy or sell. She's the best realtor I've ever had!!
